alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Kinney; Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:55AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kinney, southwestern Edwards and southeastern Val Verde Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1255 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Long Point, or 9 miles northwest of Del Rio, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Del Rio, Lake View, Amistad Acres, Laughlin AFB, Carta Valley, Cienegas Terrace, Amistad Village, Black Brush Point, Amanda, Box Canyon, Val Verde Park, Diablo East, Governors Landing, Long Point, 277 South Boat Ramp, 277 North Campground, Rough Canyon Recreation Area, Spur 406 Campground, Rock Quarry Campground and Salem Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
